subheading.title: 1. Realme 10000 mAH
subheading.content: An astonishing product coming from Realme, Which is one of the best powerbank company. With Capacity -10000 mah , it comes with 18 W FAST CHARGING support. It comes with a Two In One charging cable containing both Type C and USB type port. It also supports LOW CURRENT MODE which is for charging AIoT devices such as Bands and headphones. you will not find this functionality in any of the powerbank in this budget. Cells are made up of LITHIUM POLYMER. It is protected by 13 layers of protection.

subheading.pros: FAST CHARGING AVAILABLE,TWO IN ONE CABLE INCLUDED (USB AND TYPE C),LOW CURRENT MODE FOR A Iot  DEVICES,13 LAYERS OF PROTECTION ( which is a masterstroke in this budget),1 YEAR MANUFACTURER WARRANTY ( generally 6 months of warranty given)
subheading.cons: CHARGING OF POWERBANK CAN BE IMPROVED

questions.question: What are best powerbank company?
questions.answer: Some best powerbank companies are XIAOMI, PHILIPS, REALME, AMBRANE , SYSKA etc.

questions.question: What is actual output of a powerbank?
questions.answer: The rating in Powerbanks are theoretical. A powerbank generally gives a output of 75 to 80 Percent of its stated capacity.

questions.question: Why should we buy from best powerbank brand?
questions.answer: Powerbank contains cells, and cells are very dangerous if mis managed. It may even blast. But don't worry , a best powerbank company handle it very carefully.

questions.question: What does 10000 mah stands for?
questions.answer: The abbreviation mAh stands for milliamps per hour and is the unit that indicates how long (per hour) the power bank can deliver a certain amount of current (mA).
